restarter.partial_crash_warn: Daļējas avārijas dēļ, šis serveris tiks restartēts pēc 1 minūtes. Lūdzu pārtrauc savienojumu ar serveri tagad.
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: Daļējas avārijas dēļ, **%{servername}** tiks restartēts pēc 1 minūtes.
restarter.schedule_warn: Šī servera restartēšana ir ieplānota pēc %{smart_count} minūtes. Lūdzu atvienojies tagad. |||| Šī servera restartēšana ir ieplānota pēc %{smart_count} minūtēm.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** ir ieplānots restarts pēc %{smart_count} minūtes. |||| **%{servername}** ir ieplānots restarts pēc %{smart_count} minūtēm.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) You have been banned from this server for "%{reason}". Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) You have been permanently banned from this server for "%{reason}".
ban_messages.reject_temporary:
You have been banned from this server.
Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.
ban_messages.reject_permanent:
You have been permanently banned from this server.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.

nui_warning.title: WARNING
nui_warning.instruction: Hold [SPACE] for 10 seconds to dismiss this message.
